title: Sales Superstar wanted - Can earn as high as £100k in year 1
text:
Sales Superstar wanted - Can earn as high as £100k in year 1
[Flambard Williams Limited](/jobs/flambard-williams-limited/p17263)
Sales superstar wanted. Don't even apply unless you are the best and can prove it. Earn £40,000 if you are average, £75,000 if you are good and £100,000+ if you are great.
About Us
We are now recruiting for our expanding Canary Wharf based office.
We are looking for a sales superstar who is looking to build their own empire within ours.
Flambard Williams is an award-winning company specialist, property investment company, providing expert property solutions outside of traditional asset classes is hiring Sales Property Specialists to sell our portfolio of investment properties. If you are an experienced sales professional looking for a better opportunity or a hard-working individual who has a desire to enter the sales profession and finally start making the money you are worth, then this job may be for you.
About You
We hire star performers, not backgrounds, if you have what it takes, we will know and train you to master your field. With a small base but huge performance rewards, this job is only for those who know they are stars at sales.
First, you will be a person who is rewarded by producing results. It would be best if you were committed to meeting and exceeding our client's needs, wants and expectations because your success is in direct proportion to your ability to build professional relationships.
You love talking to people because a significant part of your job is on the phone with people (up to 6 hours a day). You will be working with an account base of clients conducting phone consultations and follow up calls.
The Job
In addition to the phone, you will be following up with prospects and clients via email and must be able to manage your time to research markets based on prospects' needs and update your contacts/opportunities in our CRM system and help process client property reservations.
You really must be comfortable in a result-driven environment and can work well with other team members, as well as start and continue work on your own. If you always need to be told what to do or are not willing to sell against high goals regardless of obstacles or rejection, then this job is probably not for you.
Next Steps
We provide ongoing world-class training, great salary options, a fantastic bonus structure and high commission potential for top achievers. If the above describes and excites you, then please submit your resume.
Required skills
- Charismatic Leadership
- Outbound Calls
- Sales
- Conversation
- Desire
Reference: 51421753
Please note
Reed.co.uk does not communicate with candidates via Whatsapp, and we will never ask you to provide your bank, passport or driving licence details during the application process. To stay safe in your job search and flexible work, we recommend visiting JobsAware, a non-profit, joint industry and law enforcement organisation working to combat labour market abuse.
